docs.snippet: MADRID, Spain, Nov. 21--Morning newspapers today featured the  communique of the Uruguayan Legation denying the cession of territory to anybody, and Arriba, the Falange newspaper, declared it "quieted the justified misgivings of the Spanish soul."
